title: War Of Roses Update: She Thinks Her Husband Is Cheating In Their Open Marriage?!
description:
You think your significant other is cheating, but you’re not certain. We’ll put them to the test!
They've been happily married for 7 years and most recently started experimenting with having an open marriage.
They gave one another a few rules, but one of the major rules that they gave each other was to do absolutely nothing other than the physical.
Our listener's husband has been spending time with the same person for a couple of months now and she's starting to doubt that they are more than just bedroom buddies.
She reached out to The Bert Show for help finding out if her husband is cheating in their open marriage.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
